text:
HAMEED SATHIK M
      HVAC Technical Coordinator 
 E-mail ID: - hameedsathik@gmail.com
 Mobile No. : - +971 58 990 2939
PROFESSIONAL OBJECTIVE
Contribute  to  the  continuous  growth  and  profitability  of  an  Organization  by
leading efforts     through my knowledge and technical skills at any deserved
position, based on my profile.
WORK EXPERIENCE
I had experience in HVAC field as technical coordinator duration of Sep 2014 to 
Dec 2017.
Job Description:-
Installation, Testing & Commissioning, Service & Maintenance of various HVAC
unit such as Split Unit, Window Unit, Package Unit, Ductable Unit, Chiller, Roof top
Unit, VRF, AHU & FCU.
Roles & Responsibilities:
Adhere  &  confirmation  to  customer  specifications  in  submitting  material
requests
Obtained major project items such as exhaust fans and pumps.
Follow the approved layout drawing and its standard reference field notes
To follow the standard procedure of HVAC Equipment installation
Monitored and ensured proper project execution in stage wise
Allocate appropriate man power for the project execution.
Conducted monthly audits to ensure timely project completion.
Performed post-project job performance evaluations.
Supervise  and  direct  a  work  force  of  15  Lead  Facility  and  Maintenance
Technicians
Perform preventive maintenance and repair service work on HVAC mechanical
plumbing  electrical  and  various  other  building  systems  to  maintain the
properties in peak operational condition
Conduct energy audits to identify where system and operational changes can
be made to decrease the property’s energy consumption
Oversee annual service work on chillers cooling towers and pump systems to
optimize operation of systems.
Follows  the  corporate  procedures  affiliated  with  OHSAS  18001:2007,  ISO
14001:2015.
Receiving  &  responding  prior  to  the  occupant  complaint  and  rectifying  at
earliest.
Ensure that identify the needs of Occupants in the Building and providing the
healthiest  environment  his  working  comfort  in  order  to  increase  the  staff
productivity.
Have done schedule option for Pumps, Chillers & AHUs in VFDs & lighting
systems in the premises in order to achieve the Energy Efficient Management
System.
Document handling & controlling to accomplish the auditing in the project. 
1 | P a g e

Co-ordinated with sub-contractor & other works which has related to HVAC
interfacing top external control panel.
ACADEMIC PROFILE
Qualified as  “Bachelor of Engineer” in the discipline of ECE with  6.4
(CGPA) from Mohamed Sathak Engineering College, Kilakarai affiliated with
Anna University Chennai in the duration of 2010-2014.
Academic Project:
An empirical study of communication infrastructure towards the smart grid
design implementation and evaluation (MAIN PROJECT). 
Line following robot (MINI PROJECT).        
ACHIEVEMENTS 
Successfully monitoring five premises in the campus without any threat to
safety and security. 
Effectively controlling & reducing energy consumption with the help of VFD
technology.
SOFTWARE SKILLS
Proficient  in MS Office, AutoCAD/2004/2007/13,  14 & 15, Small world 2.1,
Ground V10 & CMD software.
Basics in C, C++ and JAVA
STRENGTHS
Problem solving capacity
Strong Communication to field employees in order to get work done
Strong Motivation 
Team Work & Co-ordination
Able to work in Challenging Job environment
